parameters.name: All
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to remove all tags from the resources.

Enumerated values:

*   true
*   false

parameters.name: ResourceNames
parameters.description: The names of the resources. You can specify up to 50 resource names.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description:
The resource type.

Enumerated values:

*   role: RAM roles.
*   policy: policies.

parameters.name: TagKeys
parameters.description: The keys of the tags. You can specify up to 20 tag keys.
